src.Components.Login.LoginInner.SessionP: Your session password is required for sending DBET tokens and exporting your private key, and remains valid until you log out
src.Components.NewWallet.Dialogs.NextDia: Invalid passphrase. Please make sure you've entered the same phrase that was generated.
Password Confirmation must match the Session Password
Password must be at least 8 characters
Your session password is required for sending DBET tokens and exporting your private key, and remains valid until you log out
src.Components.NewWallet.NewWallet.ShowP: Write down your passphrase and store it in a safe place before clicking "Next"
src.Components.Wallet.ConfirmedTransacti: Future token transfers will be listed here
src.Components.Wallet.Dialogs.LearnMoreD:
All tokens from the initial contract will be upgraded at a 1:1 rate. If you had 100 DBETs on the initial contract, they will be upgraded to the current contract and removed from the initial contract. The new token contract will also be used for all platform functionality in the future, so please
                    make sure tokens are upgraded as soon as possible.
Removal of crowdsale functions resulting in a leaner and easier to use token contract.
Switch from throws to reverts for error conditions - which means that error transactions will not consume gas anymore saving transaction fees.
The Decent.bet token contract has been upgraded to the current version - v2 - which issues the final total supply for the token contract along with a few improvements beneficial for future usage.
Users can not transfer tokens to the token contract anymore - which otherwise would result in tokens being lost forever.
